amendment.description: Page 1258, line 19, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $28,375,000) (increased by $28,375,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to increase funding for Administrative Enforcement Initiative by reducing funding from Private Enforcement Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Stivers.
